summary: Front-end developer with 6 years of experience specializing in JavaScript, Vue, React, Node.js and modern web technologies.

experience.title: Full stack Developer
experience.description: Masa working program at Samson Logic, Tel-Aviv, Israel. Company that provides smart construction materials management. Major achievements: Modules development including a system that scans containers via smartphone camera and adds building supplies; a tracking system that simulates containers movement in 3D. Technologies used: JavaScript, React, Node, MongoDB, REST, HTML5, SCSS, Ubuntu Server.

experience.title: Front-end Developer
experience.description: Developing new system functionality on Vue: chat, notifications, briefing system, division into roles, expansion of the existing functionality. Technologies used: JavaScript, Vue, WebSocket, REST, HTML5, Sass.

experience.title: Front-end Developer
experience.description: Rewriting the project from Angular into Vue, introducing new functionality, improving old services: optimizing socket operations, request optimization, improving and expanding chat features, mentoring junior developers.

experience.title: Front-end Developer
experience.description: Real estate portal: working on a new version of the real estate portal and introducing new functionalities: creating interactive maps on mapbox-gl-js, conducting an AB testing, mentoring junior developers.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Websites development, installation on a MODX system, development of plugins and support.
